data.message: Can I do this from a LG cellphone thankyou Facebook for all the hard work our lord blessed you with so we can stay in touch with families an friends from afar Godbless you all an thankyou for much needed question 💓💓💓

replies.message: Hey Mitzi. The 360 Photos feature is available on select LG devices, with more devices being added in the coming weeks. If you'd like to take a 360 Photo using your Facebook app, simply look for the '360 Photo' icon within the drop-down menu within the 'What's on your mind' box, press the blue button and follow the path until a complete panorama has been captured. -Elizabeth
Thankyou so much very much appreciated 💓💓💓
Facebook Mark Zuckerberg needs to step up and make a major donation to help out with hurricane Harvey relief and enlist Tim Cook at Apple and others from the tech community!!
